metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4150 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The scheme48-send-definition function in cmuscheme48.el in Scheme 48 allows local users to write to arbitrary files via a symlink attack on /tmp/s48lose.tmp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4150` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cmuscheme48-el - 1.9-4
scheme48 - 1.9-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: scheme48 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9-4').
